content: lavender bunny items needed 300 yards of worsted weight yarn f hook or hook needed to produce a tight holeless fabric using your yarn felt embroidery thread or doll eyes for the face note it s a good idea to leave a large tail of yarn when fastening off the body pieces then you just sew the pieces onto the body using the tail body 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 2 single_crochet increase
